snippet: Taipei accepted an apology from Manila for the fatal shooting in May of a Taiwanese fisherman by the Philippine Coast Guard.
abstract: Taiwan ends sanctions against Philippines after accepting apology from Manila for fatal shooting in May of Taiwanese fisherman by Philippine Coast Guard.
lead_paragraph: Taipei accepted an apology from Manila for the fatal shooting in May of a Taiwanese fisherman by the Philippine Coast Guard.

headline.main: Taiwan Ends Sanctions Against Philippines Over Shooting Death
headline.print_headline: Taiwan Ends Sanctions Against Philippines Over Shooting Death
